title: COAST ORB / living under the boat

dialogueTree.title: Visual Calculus: "Great news -- the boat is big enoug..."
dialogueTree.text: Great news -- the boat is big enough for a grown man like you to fit underneath it in a supine position.

links.title: You: "Wait, what would I be doing under t..."
links.text: Wait, what would I be doing under there?

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Sleeping. Was it not decided that y..."
links.text: Sleeping. Was it not decided that you're a *hobocop* -- more hobo than cop -- or was that fine irony that your visual cortex somehow misunderstood?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Oh no. He's pretty much a bum now."
links.text: Oh no. He's pretty much a bum now.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "I don't know? Sleeping? What do peo..."
links.text: I don't know? Sleeping? What do people do under boats? This is merely a measurement from your visual cortex, do with it what you want.

links.title: Endurance: "The elements are rough around here...."
links.text: The elements are rough around here. I don't know about this...

links.title: You: ""Great news, I found somewhere new..."
links.text: "Great news, I found somewhere new to sleep."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Huh?""
links.text: "Huh?"

links.title: You: ""I said: great news, I found somewh..."
links.text: "I said: great news, I found somewhere to sleep." (Point at the boat). "Under this boat here. It'll be free."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sarcastic self pity is not what we..."
links.text: "Sarcastic self pity is not what we need at this moment, officer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I understand the situation looks g..."
links.text: "I understand the situation looks grim, but we must continue with our investigation."

links.title: Volition: "Think of it as a salvation."
links.text: Think of it as a salvation.

links.title: Logic: "You have a home, somewhere. All cop..."
links.text: You have a home, somewhere. All cops do. When this is done you can return.

links.title: You: ""I can pretty much finish the case..."
links.text: "I can pretty much finish the case from under that boat there. It's dry, weatherproof, and *free of charge*."

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna live under a boat now.""
links.text: "I'm gonna live under a boat now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Self pity is not what we need at t..."
links.text: "Self pity is not what we need at this moment, officer."

links.title: You: "Great news then. I do need somewher..."
links.text: Great news then. I do need somewhere cosy.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "No, wait -- sorry. My bad. There's..."
links.text: No, wait -- sorry. My bad. There's a rotting dog carcass under there and old fish too. You wouldn't fit next to the mummified canine's mausoleum.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Damn dog, taking up all your space...."
links.text: Damn dog, taking up all your space. The fish smell is too rank too, though.

links.title: Logic: "You have a home, somewhere. All cop..."
links.text: You have a home, somewhere. All cops do. When this is done you can return.

links.title: Volition: "Just finish the case and you'll pro..."
links.text: Just finish the case and you'll probably have somewhere to go. Hopefully.

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]
